40: שָׁאַ֣ל <sup>7592 </sup> <n>[The people] asked</n> וַיָּבֵ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and he brought</n> שְׂלָ֑ו <sup>7958 </sup> <n>quails</n> וְלֶ֥חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>them with the bread</n> שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heaven</n> יַשְׂבִּיעֵֽם׃ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>and satisfied</n>
41: פָּ֣תַח <sup>6605 </sup> <n>He opened</n> צ֭וּר <sup>6697 </sup> <n>the rock</n> וַיָּז֣וּבוּ <sup>2100 </sup> <n>gushed out</n> מָ֑יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>and the waters</n> הָ֝לְכ֗וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>they ran</n> בַּצִּיּ֥וֹת <sup>6723 </sup> <n>in the dry places</n> נָהָֽר׃ <sup>5104 </sup> <n>[like] a river</n>
42: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> זָ֭כַר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>For he remembered</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דְּבַ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>promise</n> קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>his holy</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַבְרָהָ֥ם <sup>85 </sup> <n>[and] Abraham</n> עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>his servant</n>
43: וַיּוֹצִ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>And he brought forth</n> עַמּ֣וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>his people</n> בְשָׂשׂ֑וֹן <sup>8342 </sup> <n>with joy</n> בְּ֝רִנָּ֗ה <sup>7440 </sup> <n>with gladness</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּחִירָֽיו׃ <sup>972 </sup> <n>[and] his chosen</n>
44: וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And gave</n> לָ֭הֶם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>also</n> אַרְצ֣וֹת <sup>776 </sup> <n>them the lands</n> גּוֹיִ֑ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> וַעֲמַ֖ל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>the labour</n> לְאֻמִּ֣ים <sup>3816 </sup> <n>of the people</n> יִירָֽשׁוּ׃ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>and they inherited</n>
45: בַּעֲב֤וּר ׀ <sup>5668 </sup> <n>So</n> יִשְׁמְר֣וּ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>That they might observe</n> חֻ֭קָּיו <sup>2706 </sup> <n>his statutes</n> וְתוֹרֹתָ֥יו <sup>8451 </sup> <n>his laws</n> יִנְצֹ֗רוּ <sup>5341 </sup> <n>and keep</n> הַֽלְלוּ־ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> יָֽהּ׃ <sup>3050 </sup> <n>ye the LORD</n>
